alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, northeastern Marathon and southwestern Langlade Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Council Grounds State Park, or 13 miles west of Wausau, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wausau around 615 PM CDT. Rib Mountain around 620 PM CDT. Weston around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Glandon, Ringle, Ackley Wildlife Area, Schofield, Nutterville, Hatley, Sunset, Camp Phillips Scout Camp, Hogarty and Norrie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
